content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm interested in the apartment, but I'm looking for a fair price. I'm prepared to pay a reasonable amount for the location and amenities. Would you be willing to discuss a price that reflects the value of the apartment?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Certainly, Yi-Nuo. I understand that you're looking for a fair price. Let's negotiate a rate that is acceptable to both of us. How much do you think is a reasonable amount to pay for this apartment, considering its location and amenities?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I believe that a price around 700 Euro per month would be reasonable for this apartment, given its size and central location. What do you think, Mister Schmidt?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Yi-Nuo, but 700 Euro per month is much lower than I was expecting. The location and amenities of this apartment are top-notch, and I believe a price closer to 1000 Euro per month would be more appropriate. What do you say to that?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're looking for a higher price, Mister Schmidt. However, I'm on a tight budget, and 700 Euro is my absolute maximum. I'm afraid I cannot go higher than that. Is there any wiggle room on your end?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 700 Euro is simply not acceptable. This apartment is brand new and in the city center, which commands a higher rent. I'm willing to negotiate, but not at that price. How about 900 Euro per month? This is my final offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your final offer, Mister Schmidt, but 900 Euro is still beyond my budget. I'm really looking for something closer to 750 Euro per month. I'm sorry if this isn't what you're expecting, but I'm trying to be realistic with my financial situation. Would you consider meeting in the middle at 775 Euro? That would be a fair compromise, I believe.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Yi-Nuo, but I cannot accept 775 Euro per month. This apartment is in high demand due to its location and quality, and I'm confident that I can find a tenant who is willing to pay the full 1000 Euro. I'm sorry if this is out of your budget, but I must insist on the market value for this property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect your position, Mister Schmidt. If the apartment is in such high demand, I understand that you may have other options. I'm sorry, but I cannot afford to pay 1000 Euro per month. I'll have to look for an apartment that better fits my budget. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
